data.name: Clockwork Heroes
data.detailed_description:
Humanity..

Once a race of great technology, promise and prosperity doomed the very world they built their civilization on. When saving the planet from the destructive powers of nature and war became futile, the last surviving human city decided to seek refuge from the calamity.

The arc was built to hold the collective consciousness of what was left of humanity, in hopes that when a solution was found, humanity could be revived.

You awaken in a lone capsule, abandoned in a desert with a loud WARNING repeating over and over again.

Draft, Build, Fight!
Drafting is at the core of the game. Not only when choosing cards, but also when choosing characters, talents or rewards. You build a cycle of abilities by inserting SD-cards into your character. You then fight your way through the horde.

Automatic Combat
Combat is automatic and turn-based. Place cards into one of 7 available combat slots to build your cycle. The placement, positioning and type of card has a big influence on the result of battle. During combat, both you and your enemies’ cycle is executed from left to right. Then the cycle repeats.

Endless Synergies
You will bring new strategies to life - rather than just execute strategies we made for you. Each character has over 100 unique cards, and with elements, talents and runes each character fills a number of roles based off what you need from them. Need a tanky wizard frontline? Build it!

Teamwork makes the dream work
You start out with one character, but as you travel you build a team of 3. Each brings their own synergies and switching between builds depending on what characters you get, is the key to success.

Solve the mystery
Through life, death and exploration, you try to piece together what happened to the world, how you can fix it and return humanity to its former glory.

data.short_description: A mix of hardcore card strategy, autobattle combat and characters from old JRPGs. Roguelike set in a post-apocalyptic setting where humanity is all but extinct and transhumanism is survival. Take a team of heroes through a mutated world to discover what happened at humanity's end.
